trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There was one other sighting in Tampa on or around July 17th 2012
Summary: glowing white light turning blusih at back like huge falling star
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at the bus stop on the corner of davis rd and harney rd in tampa at 5:45am going to work.I was looking up and I saw what looked like a HUGE FALLING STAR.It was bright white and was traveling across the sky from east to west and was rapidly descending like it was crashing to the ground.It made no sound and as it got across the sky the back part of it flashed a blueish color than redish for about a second.It past over the tree line and out of my eye site.there where about 5 people out there when this happened and the lady next to me I know saw it as well.It was very close to the earth because it was below the clouds.The way it looked to me it was if it was coming down but I heard no crash nor did I see any signs of a crash but it had to have landed some where.I have been trying to find any news reports but I haven't found anything yet.This is my second sighting in my lifetime, the first was when I was 13 yrs old. It was one of the most beautiful things I have ever seen and if it was not of this earth I hope they are ok:)
